metadata.title: CVE-2014-3775

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12

metadata.description: libgadu before 1.11.4 and 1.12.0 before 1.12.0-rc3, as used in Pidgin and other products, allows remote Gadu-Gadu file relay servers to cause a denial of service (memory overwrite) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted message.
